channel.title: [PI] Adding A Type Of Point To Char Files [PI]
channel.description:
I am trying to add points for something and I basically copied and pasted the pc point method. Here is what I have in Playersave.java:
Under loadGame method: [code] } else if (token.equals("special-points")) { p.specialPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2); [/code]
Under saveGame method: [code] characterfile.write("special-points = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.specialPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.specialPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();[/code]
But for some reason when I compile and receive no errors, I keep getting an exception when people log in. It repeats so many times that they cannot even connect.
I also added [code] specialPoints,[/code] In Player.java under Public int.
Help!!!

item.title: [PI] Adding A Type Of Point To Char Files [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:3, topic:390808”]I had a similar issue with this when I was deleting memberStatus.

If 17 didn’t work try some other one, and post the exception error if possible.[/quote]

Fixed. Friend told me to change it to 14 and it worked.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Adding A Type Of Point To Char Files [PI]

item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]on line
characterfile.write("special-points = ", 0, 12);
change 12 to 17

let me know if it works[/quote]
Didn’t work.

item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

I am trying to add points for something and I basically copied and pasted the pc point method. Here is what I have in Playersave.java:

Under loadGame method:

} else if (token.equals("special-points")) { p.specialPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Under saveGame method:

characterfile.write("special-points = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.specialPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.specialPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();

But for some reason when I compile and receive no errors, I keep getting an exception when people log in. It repeats so many times that they cannot even connect.

I also added

In Player.java under Public int.

Help!!!
